channel.title: The Science Gab
channel.description: Recent content on The Science Gab

item.title: A Simple Biological Circuit Simulator
item.description: In a few months time, I’m very excited to be embarking on a PhD in Interdisciplinary Biosciences. Since I trained as a phycisist, I’m keenly aware of the amount of stuff I don’t know, keenly unaware of the stuff I don’t know I don’t know, and trying to avoid the wonderful physics tradition of deceiving myself that I know what I in fact don’t know about any field that isn’t physics or pure maths.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Journal Articles Abrahams, Gabriel Jan, and Janet Newman. 2019. “BLASTing Away Preconceptions in Crystallization Trials.” Acta Crystallographica Section F Structural Biology Communications 75 (3): 184–92.

item.title: Acknowledgement of Country
item.description: I acknowledge the Traditional Custodians of the land on which I grew up and was educated, the Bunurong Boon Wurrung and Wurundjeri Woi Wurrung peoples of the Eastern Kulin Nation.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello and welcome to my blog! Contact me at: #span-7b065ffd.cloaked-e-mail:before { content:attr(data-domain) "\0040" attr(data-user); unicode-bidi:bidi-override; direction:rtl; }    var scriptTag = document.
